has_equipment_sources.description: Contains links or info on where to buy required tools/materials

has_step_by_step_instructions.description: Task is broken down clearly and sequentially

has_difficulty_rating.description: Indicates how hard the task is

has_time_estimates.description: Specifies how long the task or steps take

uses_accessible_language.description: Avoids jargon and uses everyday terms

has_visual_aids.description: Includes images, diagrams, or video links

suggests_alternatives.description: Offers substitutions for unavailable tools or ingredients

has_primary_research_refs.description: Includes citations to academic papers or published studies

has_recent_sources.description: References material from the last 5 years

includes_theoretical_basis.description: Explains why the automation approach works from a theoretical perspective

compares_alternative_methods.description: Compares the main method to others in literature

has_data_links_or_datasets.description: Links to datasets, code, or supporting research data

mentions_open_challenges.description: Notes unsolved problems or open research questions

uses_standard_terminology.description: Aligns with recognized scientific terms or taxonomies

includes_roi_analysis.description: Gives an estimate or discussion of return on investment

mentions_market_trends.description: Relates to current market data or economic context

identifies_scalability.description: Discusses whether the solution scales efficiently

compares_to_competitors.description: Mentions other solutions and how this compares

has_adoption_barriers.description: Identifies legal, logistical, or cultural blockers

mentions_automation_efficiency.description: Highlights automation gains compared to human labor

has_learning_objectives.description: States what the reader should learn from the section

is_age_appropriate.description: Content is suitable for a defined educational level

has_review_questions.description: Includes quiz questions or reflection prompts

includes_interdisciplinary_links.description: Connects the topic to other subject areas

is_modular.description: Section can be used as a standalone teaching chunk

details_implementation_steps.description: Lists precise technical actions or parameters

references_industry_standards.description: Mentions industry regulations or standards like ISO, IEEE, FDA

notes_risks_or_edge_cases.description: Identifies known failure modes or edge case conditions

includes_component_specs.description: Provides part numbers, specifications, or supplier information

supports_verifiability.description: Steps can be replicated or benchmarked independently

details_interoperability.description: Explains how the automation integrates with other systems or processes
